Topic.Title: A Great Website to Find Games for the Visually Impaired

Posts.EditableText: [url:3o7o6iat]http://www.whitestick.co.uk/[/url:3o7o6iat] has a lot of really great information for those who are visually impaired and looking for online rpg text based games to play with a host of other useful information outside the gaming genre! This is not an advertisement just an informational shout out to a guy's page who has loads of useful information all sorted and organized.
